boat.construction_details: Iroko keelson, douglas fir stringers, marineply-epoxy
boat.full_description: Classic Boat nr 127 Jan 99 Sail no 7 Sandpiper gaff yawl based on a Sussex beach boat. Although she was built at Eel Pie Island on the Thames she was launched at Brighton Marina in 1995. She is a mini floating maritime museum as she has teak recyled from a wrecked bullion ship, ex Royal Navy blocks, a tug’s porthole and a winch from a racing yacht. She is very colourful, having at least 10 different paint colours and finishes. For sale on web March 07 sold July 08
boat.name: Lizzie May
